question: Anjani Kumar Singh has been appointed the Advisor, Policy and Programme Implementation, to which chief mininster?
explanation: Anjani Kumar Singh, the former Bihar chief secretary has been appointed the Advisor, Policy and Programme Implementation, to Bihar Chief Minister Nitish Kumar. Anjani Kumar Singh is an IAS officer of 1981 batch. He retired in February 2018. But he was given an extension for 3 months. As Anjani Kumar Singh's extension period ended, Deepak Kumar took charge as the new chief secretary of Bihar.
